info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 5:27PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Anderson, southwestern Pickens and southeastern Oconee Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 527 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Seneca, or near Westminster, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clemson, Seneca, Central, Pendleton, Westminster, Lake Hartwell, Townville and Oakway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
